mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user_notice` ( id, title, content, type, sender, has_all ) VALUES ( #{notice.id}, #{notice.title}, #{notice.content}, #{notice.type}, #{notice.sender}, #{notice.hasAll} )
INSERT INTO `user_notice_desc` ( id, notice_id, receive, has_read ) VALUES ( #{noticeDesc.id}, #{noticeDesc.noticeId}, #{noticeDesc.receive}, #{noticeDesc.hasRead} )
mapper.select:
SELECT n.title, n.content, n.type, n.sender, l.username AS senderName, n.has_all, n.create_date, d.* FROM `user_notice` AS `n` LEFT JOIN `user_notice_desc` AS `d` ON `n`.id = `d`.notice_id LEFT JOIN `sys_login` AS `l` ON `n`.sender = `l`.id WHERE `d`.receive = #{userId}
AND `n.type` = #{type}

SELECT n.title, n.content, n.type, n.sender, l.username AS receiveName, n.has_all, n.create_date, d.* FROM `user_notice` AS `n` LEFT JOIN `user_notice_desc` AS `d` ON `n`.id = `d`.notice_id LEFT JOIN `sys_login` AS `l` ON `d`.receive = `l`.id WHERE `n`.sender = #{userId}
